text: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
author: Peter Marshall

text: I have declared that patience is never more than patient. I too have declared, that I who am not patient am patient.
author: Gertrude Stein

text: It is impossible to practice parliamentary politics without having patience, decency, politeness and courtesy.
author: Khaleda Zia

text: I have all the patience in the world about Sirens. For me it's not a Grateful Dead project, it's a Me project.
author: Jerry Garcia

text: The principle part of faith is patience.
author: George MacDonald
